Desc.entry: A multi-purpose building designed to provide a place of worship and a place of support, encouragement and activity for the local community. Activities include service and lunch for older people and social and activity groups for people with mental health problems. Runs a coffee bar and has various rooms available for hire (see separate entry).

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 10am-2pm (church office hours); Tues 1-4pm (Stroke Dysphasia Association), 7.30-9.30 (Chill - youth club for those aged 13 years and over), Wed 12.30-2pm (toddler group), 5-7pm (Youth Club for children aged 8-11 years), Thurs & Sat (contact group for people with mental health problems), Fri (folk lunch club)
